ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mithril vs. Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: Lambent Vambraces have no +str.  Mithril are +7.  Only 1 AC less as well, probably better as +5 magic is usually better than +2 all. BP is 3 less AC but
ygData.messageBody:
Lambent Vambraces have no +str. Mithril are +7. Only 1 AC less as well,
probably better as +5 magic is usually better than +2 all.

BP is 3 less AC but definitely has stat bonuses. +30hp and +15 AGI.
Probably a push in this area with the +5 STA and +25 HP from Lambent.

Mithril Greaves are also +7STR and +5 MR just like the Vambraces. They are
3AC less than Lambent though.

Not sure what other Mithril is out there but I think at least 2 of these are
pretty close to their Lambent counterparts unless you really need the +1
CHA.

Kitasi

>I've only seen 2 Mithril pieces, but they were both inferior to Lambent.
>BP had less AC, no stat bonuses and weighed more.
>Vambraces? had less AC and less +STR.
>Bien
